short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks some domains in Search Results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simply click "â†’ block" near a Google Search result item to either

a) Hide results from domain  ("Hide" option), or
b) Show only a single grey line ("Only show the link" option), or
c) Show the result in grey or light grey ("Grey" or "Light grey" options)

as defined in the <Options> menu.

Options: right-click the extension icon and enter "Options", to

- Choose the "Blocker" behavior
- Un-block domains

Version history

2021-02-20  2.0.0  rewrote the URL recognition algorithm as Google changed their results presentation
2020-06-11  1.0.1  Removed unused permissions (only "Storage" remains to save blocked sites)
2019-03-22  1.0.0  Production
